EmailTemplate.name: HEal Networking event 2016
EmailTemplate.subject: Hounslow and Ealing Networking Event Invitation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.Name},
We would like to invite you to a celebration event we are holding on the 16th of June in Ealing Town Hall. This will be a great opportunity for you to meet our entire team, look at expectations and how you would like summer 2016 to run and to network with all of our partners across Hounslow and Ealing.
We would love you to join us for some Tea, Coffee and Cake
Liz Cantell Room, Ealing Town Hall, New Broadway, London W5 2BY
Thursday 16th June - 15:00 - 17:00
***Any questions please call Charlotte on 07785627449***
OVERVIEW
15:00 - Event starts.
15:15 - Meet and Greet.
15:45 - Looking back at NCS successes
16:00 - Thank you yo our partners
16:15 - Networking and Refreshments.
17:00 - Event finishes.
If you are interested in attending please order yourself a free ticket here!
The Challenge Network is registered in England and Wales, no 6845451. Registered charity no. 1129239. Registered address: 39 York Rd, London SE1 7NQ
